content.question: Respond to all parts of the question. In your response, use substantive examples where appropriate. Use the bar graph to answer the following questions. Describe the percentage of Democrats in 2014 who described themselves as “mostly liberal.” Describe a trend over time that the data illustrate. Draw a conclusion about that trend. Explain how the data in the bar graphs illustrate the role of ideology in the political party system.
